name: Ye Olde Meme Game 2
description:
Ye Olde Meme Game 2 creatively brings your favorite memes from the past 2 decades to life.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HZVB3IJ37bU&t=185s

You fight as Memorang Man, facing the perilous journey to reach Rainbow Frog at the end of the level. To get there, you must defeat angory meme enemies using the weapons at your disposal, all while trying to not lose health, gain a high score, and win in record time.

Play through the riveting campaign and endure the heartbreaking story of Memorang Man and his family.

Once you've learned the ropes, endlessly play levels created by other users in the level builder! Find hot and trending levels, and compete on the level-granular leaderboards for clout. Or show off your creativity and create and share your own levels from scratch!

The level builder allows for extreme customization of your creations. Build 2D terrain of any desired shape, place meme items anywhere on the level, write your own text to form a storyline, and enter experimental mode for even further (and potentially game-breaking) customization. In fact, there is so much freedom given, you are fully responsible for the performance and quality of your published level, which other users can rate.

Meme game is here to track and revive the dead, forgotten memes we all used to love and enjoy, as well as document new memes for future preservation.

Features

- Level builder to create your own levels from scratch
- Browse and play other users' created levels and set records on the leaderboards
- Campaign story mode to master the gameplay and experience the narrative
- Memes, everywhere
